name: getCampaigns
description: Get all campaigns in an account.

fields.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

exclude_fields.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

count.description: The number of records to return. Default value is 10. Maximum value is 1000

offset.description: Used for [pagination](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/methods-parameters/#pagination), this it the number of records from a collection to skip. Default value is 0.

before_send_time.description: Restrict the response to campaigns sent before the set time. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

since_send_time.description: Restrict the response to campaigns sent after the set time. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

before_create_time.description: Restrict the response to campaigns created before the set time. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

since_create_time.description: Restrict the response to campaigns created after the set time. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

list_id.description: The unique id for the list.

member_id.description: Retrieve campaigns sent to a particular list member. Member ID is The MD5 hash of the lowercase version of the list memberâ€™s email address.

sort_field.description: Returns files sorted by the specified field.

sort_dir.description: Determines the order direction for sorted results.
